column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Sausage Freak F. - Thanks for the great review. I hope in the future you can have a sit-down bowl of our ramen
column2: as that is the optimal method of serving it. Regardless
column3: I am very pleased that you still find our fare worthy as takeout. For what it's worth
column4: we serve hundreds of families with children of all ages every day of the week. With all due respect
column5: we have not found any hindrances in this regard
column6: and we are happy to serve customers of all ages. Beyond that
column8: I greatly appreciate your kind words.
